name: City
short: A comprehensive city simulation system with various activities
description: A modular city simulation system that includes various activities for users to engage in. Currently features a crime system for earning credits through virtual crimes with different risk levels, cooldowns, rewards, jail system, jail breaks, dynamic events, and more.
end_user_data_statement:
This cog stores user data including:
- Cooldown timers for various activities
- Statistics for activities (e.g., successful/failed crimes)
- Jail status and duration
- Last target information for anti-farming
All data can be removed with the standard Red delete data commands.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing the City cog!

Notes:
- Uses Config to store user stats and settings
- Moderate memory usage for tracking active crimes and jail status
- Requires bank to be registered (`[p]bank register`)
- Requires manage_messages permission for button interactions
- Anti-farming measures track last target IDs

Get started with `[p]crime` to explore the crime system. Use `[p]crimeset` for configuration.
